backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining core domain types (Mood, Gender, RelationshipIntent, UserProfile, etc.) with text conversion helpers, user profile data structures, and authorization imports for a social/emotional app backend.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable report listing implemented frontend features, affected files, dependent components, test IDs, and confidence levels for UI text and branding changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style map providing concise descriptions of major frontend React components, pages, and UI elements to aid understanding and planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and base styles for the application UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, page title, root mount node, and loading the React application bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router routes, authentication/profile gates, theme provider, and global toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/app/AppHeader.ts: Sticky top header showing CloseCircle branding and a user dropdown with profile, journal, and sign-out actions.
frontend/src/components/app/AppLayout.ts: Main layout wrapper combining header, routed content outlet, bottom navigation, floating journal controls, and journal overlay state.
frontend/src/components/app/BottomNav.ts: Fixed bottom navigation bar with route buttons for feed, circle, compose, and notifications, including unread badge counts.
frontend/src/components/app/FloatingJour: Floating action button that conditionally appears to navigate users to the compose/journal page.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication guard that shows a loading spinner during identity initialization, renders the login panel if unauthenticated, or children when logged in.
Renders the login screen using Internet Identity, showing branding, security highlights, and a login button with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleMem: Displays the current user's circle members with profile details, supports removing members, and handles loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/circle/JoinByCod: Provides a form to join a circle by entering a share code, normalizing input and sending a join request with success/error feedback.
frontend/src/components/circle/PendingRe: Lists pending join requests to the user's circle, showing requester profiles and allowing accept or decline actions.
frontend/src/components/circle/ShareCode: Shows the user's current share code with copy functionality and allows editing/updating the code with validation and warnings.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalD: A popover-based date picker for selecting a journal date, disabling future dates and formatting the selected date.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalE: Displays, creates, and deletes journal entries for a selected date, allowing edits only for today and read-only viewing for past dates.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalO: Implements a side-sheet overlay that hosts the journal UI, managing selected date state and composing the date picker and entries panel.
frontend/src/components/profile/MoodAnal: Renders a card that analyzes a user's mood history over a selectable timeframe, showing trends, concern levels, and top moods using derived statistics.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileG: Guards child content by loading the current user's profile and conditionally showing a profile setup dialog or a loading screen.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Implements a multi-step onboarding dialog to collect and save a user's profile information, including name, demographics, preferences, and a generated share code.
frontend/src/components/status/MoodPicke: Provides a searchable, categorized grid UI for selecting a mood from predefined mood options.
frontend/src/components/status/StatusCar: Displays a single status post with author info, mood emoji/label, optional content, timestamp, and audience details.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Defines application-level branding constants such as the app name.
frontend/src/constants/moods.ts: Defines the MoodOption interface and a categorized catalog of all supported moods with labels and emojis.
frontend/src/contexts/FloatingJournalVis: Provides a React context and hook to control the visibility state of a floating journal UI component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity, handling anonymous access, admin initialization, and query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a React context, provider, and hook to manage Internet Identity authentication, including login/logout, persisted identity loading, and detailed login status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useJournal.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch, create/update, and delete journal entries via a backend actor, with date-based filtering and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useMoodHistory.ts: Computes a chronological mood history for the current user by filtering feed posts within a timeframe and mapping them to mood/date entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for interacting with backend actors, covering user profiles, join requests, feed/status data, mutations, and cache management.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme color variables, base styles, typography, and safe-area utilities for responsive layouts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and imports global styles.
frontend/src/pages/CirclePage.tsx: Circle management page with tabbed UI for viewing members, handling join requests, sharing invite codes, and joining a circle.
frontend/src/pages/ComposeStatusPage.tsx: Form page for composing and posting a mood status, including mood selection, optional text, audience selection, and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays the userâ€™s feed of status updates with loading/empty states, manual refresh, and navigation to compose a new status.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Renders a notifications inbox that fetches, groups, and displays read/unread notifications, marks them as read on click, and navigates to related status details. Handles loading, empty states, and shows a placeholder alert for upcoming push notifications.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and edits the current user's profile, including personal details, preferences, and relationship intent, with form validation and save/cancel flows. Integrates profile update APIs, toast feedback, and hides a floating journal UI while editing.
frontend/src/pages/StatusDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a single status by ID with loading and error handling. Provides navigation back to the main feed and renders the status via a reusable StatusCard component.
frontend/src/utils/age.ts: Provides helpers to calculate age from a birthdate bigint, format birthdates for input fields, and parse date input strings back to bigint timestamps. Includes validation for invalid or future dates.
frontend/src/utils/moodAnalysis.ts: Analyzes mood entries to compute distributions, dominant mood, trends, concern levels, and user guidance with a safety disclaimer. Classifies moods by sentiment and applies conservative thresholds for mental health insights.
frontend/src/utils/shareCode.ts: Generates a random, user-friendly 6-character alphanumeric share code, excluding visually ambiguous characters. Intended for onboarding or sharing flows.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Utility functions for converting between backend nanosecond timestamps and JavaScript Dates, plus helpers for day boundaries and date comparisons. Also includes formatting helpers for display and input fields.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters from query strings or hash routing, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them when needed. Supports maintaining sensitive or session-scoped parameters across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, content paths, container layout, and extensive theme extensions for colors (using CSS variables/OKLCH), typography, radius, shadows, fonts, and animations, with several Tailwind plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Project metadata and evolving state document describing the vision, scope, and implemented features of a private close-circle social/mood app, including authentication, profiles, invite codes, circle management, status updates, and in-app notifications.
